Since the answer may be very large, return it modulo 109 + 7.\n        vector<long long> sum(n,1); //second 0.\n        //vector<long long> sum_prev(n,1); //previous loop.\n\n        for(int i=1; i<=k; i++) {\n            for(int j=1; j<n; j++) { //update sum from sum_prev.\n                sum[j] = (sum[j]+sum[j-1]) % (1000000000+7);\n            };\n            //sum_prev = sum;\n        };\n\n        int ans = sum[n-1] % (1000000000+7); \n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-n-th-value-after-k-seconds","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
